website_summaries.verdict: A popular crib toy that entertains and soothes at the same time. Ideal for babies who have a tough time falling asleep without assistance.
pros: Bright colors, moving sea creatures, and underwater light effects are positively mesmerizing
Classical melodies and ocean sounds work to soothe fussy babies
Sound and lights gradually fade before automatically shutting off
Fits most crib rails and easily attaches to car headrests for on the go use

customer_reviews.title: Defective and Not Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a week or two until I noticed the fish stopped moving. Then the songs stopped playing all the way through. Just the first three notes on loop. So tonight I figured maybe it was the batteries when it just wasn’t working at all. I replaced the batteries (it’s 4 C batteries, not 3 AAA as the listing suggests). Well it’s dead. Nothing works at all. When it did work, my son loves the moving fish but as one poster wrote, the songs are NOT soothing and very loud even on the lowest setting. Hoping Amazon can help me return this piece of junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This finally made car rides enjoyable for my 10 week old. We spend the first few weeks of her life struggling with each and every car ride. She loves to watch the fish move and the soothing ocean wave sounds puts her right to sleep. I also love that it has a remote because I can turn it on and off while driving. I am such a fan of this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah_English

customer_reviews.title: No battery leakage
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. I was so skeptical based on some bad reviews but to my surprise, its perfect! It came with batteries but no leakage of any kind! Brand new and works great! It came in a factory package, not in the store package which makes me think that they got rid of all the ones who had issues!
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: Good for babies - a little loud though
customer_reviews.text: Like: sounds and motion, timer and fade to off setting, easy to move it to a different side of the crib in one simple click Dislike: too loud, not enough volume or light control, timer kicks in no matter what, no option to keep light on all night. Also only 4 settings and no in-between We have had ours for a week or two, we had to put two layers of masking tape over the speaker because the low setting was too loud for our little one.
customer_reviews.author: SMDesign

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. We purchased this soother because the one we purchased from Baby Einstein for my son three years ago was amazing. He loved it so much that we had to figure out how to attach it to his toddler bed! This product however is no where near comparison, which is disappointing since it’s from the same manufacturer. The sound is incredibly loud, the lights blink with the beat of the music and the little animals moving along to the music sqeak the entire time (sounds like an old door opening and closing). We’ve only used this product a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Regina S.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive at 40$, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: So as a toy, it's expensive to pay 40$ for what you seemingly get However, I believe this was priced based on what you get from it rather than just taking the cost of manufacturing and selling it as the main consideration We have a 4 months old and this has been a blessing He's a real good boy but being able to use the 'white noise' feature really helps Yes, you can get a white noise machine for half the price - but this has the soothing music feature and nice blue calming lights and fish All in all, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amir Zeenreich

customer_reviews.title: New version not as nice
customer_reviews.text: I am not as happy with the new version of this soother as the old version. Our 3 year old used hers for 3 1/2 years with no problems other than it’s tendency to eat batteries quickly. It was a lifesaver! Recently, I bought a new one for her after the motor died, which was understandable due to its excessive use. I also bought the new version for our newborn. Both have the same flaw. The strap that attaches It the the crib/bed does not stay tight. They are always facing downwards and we are tightening them up more than once a day. I’m very disappointed after the great experience we had with the original.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for soothing new baby
customer_reviews.text: My son spent the first 6 weeks of his life in the hospital and they had this toy and hooked it to his hospital crib. He was in a trance anytime we turned it on and it helped soothe him to sleep many nights. Before we left the hospital I ordered it to make sure it was at our house waiting for when we got home. We use it pretty frequently still. My mother in law saw it during a FaceTime call and actually ordered it and had it sent to us too so now we have a backup in case the one I bought stops working!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sea Dreams
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for one of these and finally found it. We have this attached to the side of the babys crib and she loves it. She can kick the star to turn it on herself if she gets bored or frustrated. Only complaint would be the volume. I wish it could go a little lower. There are two volume settings but both are louder than I'd prefer for a baby at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Chaely Byers

customer_reviews.title: Great in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. I have to say, I really don't use the music to sooth because it is a little louder but its a great distraction when baby is in the crib while you are doing chores in their room. The ocean noise isn't bad if you are a sound machine user. We honestly love the fact that there is a button for just the light to come on. We use it in the middle of the night for those late night feedings and the lighting is perfect. Its not so bright that it fully wakes baby.
customer_reviews.author: Reba Anne

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: So we have bought 2 of these, both of them started having issues by the end of the first week and by the end of the 2nd or 3rd the motor to this fish burned out or some electrical issue made it turn off and turn back on over and over again. Our baby isnt even old enough to be the one to turn it on or off so its not like it was being treated rough. The thing just is not built to actually be used. So take this as fair warning, it'll be good-ok out of the box but once you turn it on, the countdown begins to it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I’m so bummed about this. My daughters both had this when they were babies... they shared the SAME ONE and it lasted years. So I got this one for my son thinking it would be the same quality... it stopped working today. Not only that but the remote never once worked. And this thing was PRICY! Huge letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: I have this attached to the side of the crib for my grandson and he loves it. I turn it on each time I lay him down and it really does help him sleep. If he wakes during the night, he will push the large button on the bottom to turn it on and falls back asleep. It is also has a ceiling light but the one on mine never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Williams

customer_reviews.title: More of a daytime toy than sleep aide
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty genius product. It had a lot of great functions however this definitely is not suited for bedtime because the buttons are too easy to turn on and off the brightness. The brightness is wayyy too high for my 10 month daughter to fall asleep and she managed to figure out within ten min how to turn on the bright option so it ended up having the opposite effect. Now it just keeps her awake. I now just let my kids play with it during the day. I wish only the remote can adjust the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Riedel

customer_reviews.title: really great product for infants where you can install it on the crib
customer_reviews.text: The product is great for infants to soothe them when they drift themselves to sleep. It has many different kinds of music that play for 25 minutes, you can the option of having the music on and the lights on, or you can have both on, or you can the music off but the light on where the fishes are moving. It even has a remote control button where you can turn on the device to play so that you don't have to go so close to turn it on and wake up the infant. The remote control button does need batteries though as it does not come with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: alba

customer_reviews.title: If it aint broke, don't fix it.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned about 5 of these when my daughter was an infant / toddler. Now that she is older and we have a second child, I knew I had to have one. Unfortunately, Baby Einstein has completely redesigned this. The fixture at the back no longer allows for easy hanging in the crib and the songs are totally different. Wish they would have left a great thing great. Due to the new hanging fixture, I won't be purchasing another one (or using this one very much).
customer_reviews.author: Kate W

customer_reviews.title: A good buy, but a little loud
customer_reviews.text: We got a good one, I'm happy with our buy. I've been thinking about this toy for our second child as our first loved his. (He has the older version.) But with some iffy reviews I held off. Once I saw some more positive recent ones I decided to go for it. It's fine, it's cute. The lower volume is still too loud but it doesn't seem to bother my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kulpa

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to replace the first one
customer_reviews.text: My kid used this every night and for naps (several times a day) for 2 years straight. She now kicks it with her foot while laying down and it soothes her. After 2.5 years of that constant use and abuse, the motors started to wear down and make more noise. So I bought her a new one and it’s great. I now buy this for friends when they are having a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a standard rail
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I loved the remote! My 7 month old can shut this off though by the easy big starfish button down bottom! **make sure you have a rail that will fit it!** The 2nd pic is showing a rail that it wouldn’t fit which is where I wanted it to go :/
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my 10 month old. We just started doing slight sleep training with him and this is a great self soothing product for him. He even figured out how to turn it on himself which I really like. It’s louder than I expected, even on the lowest setting, so I may try to muffle the sound a bit to make it less distracting. But overall it has worked perfectly. The remote feature is nice too for when he wakes and I want him to try to fall asleep on his own without me completely entering the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl loves her "fishies". I purchased this with the intent to help calm her before bedtime and when she got up in the middle of the night but turns out this excites her way too much. She smiles like crazy when we turn it on. We now use it when we need a quick break to switch out laundry or clean something up. We can put her in the crib and it will keep her mesmerized for about 15-20 minutes (until the lights turn off).
customer_reviews.author: K. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a lifesaver! My some at about one would not sleep through the night. He quickly became fascinated and learned to choose his own settings and put himself to sleep. The remote is very handy too! My only draw back is that it seems to go through batteries fairly quickly but it’s nit a deterrent; if it broke I would buy it again wi5 no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: LIBBY

customer_reviews.title: If you’re replacing the old version, DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: If I didn’t have to give at least one star, I wouldn’t. I ordered this to replace one I had originally purchased in 2014. The old version died so I figured this new version would be perfect. I was so wrong. After using this for only a few nights, it just decided to not shut off after the allotted time, and it ran all night long and just kept repeating the same snippet of a song. It’s like it was just stuck. It was absolutely maddening to listen to the baby monitor. This version just feels cheap compared to the old one. I’m extremely dissatisfied and will be calling customer service tomorrow, hopefully they will make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I like the different settings on it and how it will gradually get dimmer and the music will get lower. They only thing is I wish the batteries lasted longer. Oh well. Also for my crib, it won't hang off the side, so I had to attach it to the wood planks itself. No biggie. Baby cant knock it over, and he can also turn it on himself. Also, the little remote will not work through the door, so if you use it, you have to be in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri VR

customer_reviews.title: It’s mesmerizing!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old screams when she goes in the crib awake or asleep. I got this as an attempt to entice her to stay in the crib. She fell asleep by herself by the 2nd night! I hope it keeps working it’s magic for long time! updated review - my baby reverted to her old ways on the 3rd night. she doesn't care about this thing and she hates the crib. i tried.
customer_reviews.author: tea junkie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves this!! We set it up on her crib when we moved her to her own room and have used it every night since. We find that the moving sea creatures and brightness of the display distract her instead of soothe her, so we just play the music without any lights and she's good to go. The crib check light is also so handy for finding her binky in the middle of the night. It is so easy to use, baby girl has figured out how to turn it off and on!!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: So soothing to babies
customer_reviews.text: My dad had gotten me one of these for my eldest and it allowed me peace of mine as my child was a cluster feeder and I couldn’t get a break! This allowed the little one to sleep peacefully in their own bed. I had to replace it in the registry and can’t wait to use it for my little one due in June! I can’t remember if I had to put batteries in this but did have to add two triple AAA to the remote, everything works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Israel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Baby Einstein has great products. Each one of my grandkids has one of these. The 6 year old still uses it as a night light to chase away had dreams at night. The youngest at 9 months could turn it on with the large button when she was in her crib. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Redcandies of NorCal

customer_reviews.title: My baby likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes it a lot. It has pretty good sound with some bass, not like all-treble kind you find in many of these devices. I like the song selection, even with a cool variation of Twinkle Twinkle Little Star As a musician I appreciated this. The only issue is that it seems too bright if all lights are off. I would also like to have movement without the lights on.
customer_reviews.author: Onion

customer_reviews.title: The best musical bed mobile ever.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this Baby Einstein music box so much that I had to buy one for my son’s house for his twin baby boys and one for me, Mimi’s house too! The boys are 7 months old and love turning it on and off themselves when they are awake. The only negative is the volume does not go very low. They love the fish floating, the lights and the music is great!
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but glitches!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby really loves this toy but it glitches a lot, sometimes for days at a time. Look at the video for an example. You will turn it on and the start up sound plays over and over, no music, no lights and no movement from the sea creatures. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Zandra Evans

customer_reviews.title: SO LOUD
customer_reviews.text: It's SOOOO LOUD at the quiet setting. I noticed that if you want just theught on without the blaring sounds the fish won't move which is kind of dissapointing. We might try to muffle the speaker so it isn't so loud because it would be a great thing to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Beers

customer_reviews.title: Saved my sanity
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES this crib toy, and it has definitely saved my sanity. He will turn it on when he goes to sleep, and turns it on when he wakes up during the night to go back to sleep. He even likes to turn it on when he’s not in the crib. I really like how the music and light fade out slowly. Definitely worth the money and we get so much more sleep since we’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Baby absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1 month old and oh boy he loves it. Weve had some of the best naos yet with it and it provides him with so much entertainment. One thing is its ridiculously loud even on the low volume setting. Especially for night time. But i just wedned a burp rag against the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Crib trained my baby with this
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the pediatric hospital for our babies and they really like it so I bought one for my fussy infant and crib trained him with this. He calmly watches it, listening to ocean sounds while falling asleep. Then for day nap I turn on the classical music.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Baby Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 month old with digestive issues. After many days and nights of being unable to get him to relax and sleep, we bought this and it’s a miracle box. A month later and it’s still something he loves staring at. The characters are cute and the music plays for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Medley

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Way too bright to be soothing. She literally squints her eyes when I turn it on and looks the other way. The creatures no longer move along with the music and she only used it less than ten times before that went wrong. The remote won’t work from outside the room, it only works if I point it directly in front of the main part, so there’s no point in it if I have to go in the room to turn it on. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FireWife8917

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So adorable I bought it for my granddaughter she's only a month old but the soothing sounds help her fall asleep and I know she will get years of enjoyment out of it. My son had something like this when he was a baby ( he's 12 now) but, he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Baby Einstein Sea Dreams Soother Musical Crib Toy and Sound Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these toys I've ordered .... The first one broke after 4 weeks. The 2nd one I ordered lasted 3 months. This is not acceptable!! This is a musical toy that is not touched or handled by the infant so it should not stop working. I've always regarded Baby Einstein toys in high regard but this particular toy has been a disappointment. I would like to get one that lasts longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: bann714

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to give this to my little happy! She will be seven in April. She is legally blind but is able to see some light and high contrast colors. She also has sever spastic quad cerebral palsy but she will be able to hit the button to turn it on and I can help with the remote. She is going to love this! I can’t wait for her to open it will update once she opens it
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Bought two- both defective
customer_reviews.text: This product barely lasted a month. There is a defect where the music gets stuck in the most annoying high pitched sound and it repeats over and over and over again not stopping. It happened on both music settings and even sfter turning off and restarting multiple times it would always go back to being stuck. If I was in another room while it was on, suddenly I’d hear my baby crying and it was bc the noise was back and ok repeat. We bought a second one at walmart thinking this was defective and same problem. Unfortunately while it is a great concept there is something wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: m_Hondu

customer_reviews.title: Very loud but the baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the volume had a button to turn it lower but it only has loud and very loud. The white noise/ocean effect is so loud that it doesn’t help him to relax and sleep but keeps him up. Another wish list was that the figures moved without the ocean or music. Like a muted option. Otherwise he loves it. Just not ideal for him to fall asleep with more to keep him occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Puppettemistress

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for less than a week before it started making a horrible clicking sound during use. It also had only 2 volume settings for music and sounds and it was quite loud, even on the lowest setting. I've bought crib soothers for my older children in the past that were made by Fisher-Price and we never had any issues. Have noticed that KIDS2 products have problems with design and production flaws from other items I've recently purchased. Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: M&D

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping assistant!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She watches it until she falls asleep without making a sound! I wish you could dim the light a little but it's not the end of the world. Just a little jarring if she isn't fully awake when it's turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Kim A

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The only downfall I have is that I wish there was a way I could only do moment and light with no sounds, or have a lower volume option (but that’s only because she already has another sound machine). I bought this to give her something to do when she’s having a hard time sleeping and it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh ann colley

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and entertaining for baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves playing with this in her crib. The music is soft and soothing, also has a white noise option. Lights are a bit bright in the middle of the night. It’d be nice if this was adjustable like the volume is. You do have the option to have the lights off so it’s not a huge deal. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Our son was recently in the hospital for surgery. During our stay they brought in this toy. Needless to say it wasn't in the best condition from multiple uses between kids. But!!!! He LOVED it. The ocean sound, music, and lights really calmed him down. I decided that one would be needed at home. He knows that by touching the star on the bottom it will turn on and off. So, that's his thing to do when we put him to bed till he drifts off to sleep. It doesn't drain the life of the batteries. Great quality. Definitely an awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Plummer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a baby group recommendation. Can't say my 5 month old has fallen to sleep with it yet. The volume is loud even on quiet mode. Wish I could control the loudness and brightness. Also, it does not fit around my crib bar so I need to wrap it around the poles so it's always leaning on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: atheom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about this since it is pretty expensive but I’m glad we got it! Both of my kids love it! They are 4 and 10 months. It helps my son entertain himself and he enjoys turning it on all on his own. If he wakes up at night or early in the morning instead of crying he turns this on and talks away.
customer_reviews.author: Product.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for naps and bedtime
customer_reviews.text: My son has used a music machine since he started sleeping in his crib and it helps sooth and put him to sleep. We even take it with us on trips. It's a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Parentals

customer_reviews.title: Our Baby Loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool addition to the crib. We have a TV in the room but I don't like her staring at the TV all day, this is a good alternative. I'm impressed how fast the baby figured out how to turn this thing on and off. Sometimes we'll wake up at night and she'll be staring at this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hamm

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the remote actually worked remotely
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this little aquarium! He will get up and turn on and off the sounds and lights in the middle of the night to try and soothe himself back to sleep or when he wakes up from a nap during the day. The only criticism I have is that the remote control that comes with it is infrared and does not work through the door. It has to be pointed directly at the sensor while you are in the room, which kind of defeats the point of having it if you don’t want to wake your baby up (like if you want to turn the system back on from outside the room).
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Baby finally self soothed!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been trying to get our 6 month old to start self soothing. She does it with her babysitter, but won’t with us. It tears at our hearts to let her cry so the first thing I thought of was a product like this. Looked one up, found this and thought “hey it’s worth a shot” Tonight is night one. Turned it on from outside her room with the remote when she woke up. About 5 minutes later she started calming down and she’s out again! Hoping that future nights are like this first night!
customer_reviews.author: JoPo

customer_reviews.title: Does not rotate fluid.
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked ok except it rotates and slides at the end of the rotation and makes it look robotic definitely not fluid and definitely not worth 40 bucks for it. I made a video showing what it did. If this made it through quality control then it’s horrible. Surely they turn these on and watch them spin a few times before they send them to the buyer that pays an insane amount for them.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great grow with them toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this toy in her crib. There are multiple setting for volume and lights so you can pick which one you prefer, also comes with a shell shaped remote for the child. You can also turn off and in using the starfish on the front of the toy. Just an overall great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Initially stuck in demo mode but fixed
customer_reviews.text: I took the tag out the item in the back to take it out of demo mode when I received it. Yet it would only play for a few seconds and turn off, the remote wouldn’t work either. I took it apart and it seemed as if the switch where the demo tag was is upside down. So I wedged a piece of toothpick in there and now it works fine. Hope this helps someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Habiba

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is very nice and it build very well. The little animals are cute and it does look like a small aquarium. I gave it two starts overall because it is so loud and so bright the baby wakes up and instead of sleeping, stairs into the light. It doesn't help him fall asleep and instead it wakes him up. :( I was disappointed because this product looked promising. I missed the return window so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie$

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product created by dishonest company. On first night in my baby's crib the straps loosened and I found him in the morning with his head wedged against it. It didn't fall on him but lowered enough that he could roll into it at night
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! So thankful we purchased this adorable aquarium for our little one!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness we bought this! We have been using this since our little girl was just a couple weeks old - it's been a life saver! She becomes extremely errors irritable near her bedtime Ana nothing soothes her - not until we lay her in the crib and turn on the ocean sound and glowing "aquarium" - honestly, she lies in her crib and absolutely adores this until she falls asleep. Definitely one of the top best purchases we've made so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Loud
customer_reviews.text: It's really really really loud! And sucks battery power like crazy. It is neat though. Did I mention it's super loud?
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY! My newborn LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS TOY! My newborn loves to stare at it and it soothes him. Has different settings of lullabies or waves. Lights are calming and little figures move around. HIGHLY recommend this toy. If its IN-STOCK GET IT. Only con is the first two I received seemed refurbished. Scratched/discolored. Provided in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best item of all the things we have bought by far.
customer_reviews.text: We have furnished a whole room for our new grandson and most of our daughters baby room and this musical light up aquarium that I bought for both rooms has been the best thing that we have bought. He absolutely is mesmerized by this and enjoys just laying in the crib staring at it and listening to the songs that go in a loop. Can’t recommend this item enough. You have to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice during the daytime but horrible at night.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute BUT it is LOUD and super bright! I even tried placing layers of tape over the speaker and placing it away from the crib. It kept my LO up and unhappy. It is great for the daytime when the light is bright and there is daytime noise, but it’s horrible at night.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Bennett

customer_reviews.title: crappy product
customer_reviews.text: this product is a piece of crap. not even one month, and the light option is broken. it loops and loops and won’t play any ocean or lullaby sounds if it’s on the light option. do NOT buy
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Yikes. This thing has major sound issues. Every key within the song that it plays is off by one or two notes. It actually sounds like it's going to die any minute. We changed the batteries it came with and it did not help. The lowest setting is actually pretty loud, and that's annoying since the sound sucks. I would buy a different product instead of this thing. People weren't lying when they said they have issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lamke

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Both the 3 1/2 year old and the 4 month old absolutely love this! It has beautiful colors, music or ocean sounding noise bits of movement from the sea creatures and it looks like real sunlight coming through actual moving water on the top.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Remote is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: It is a good idea but the lights are too bright, the sound is too loud. And most importantly, the remote is useless. Mine only worked if the machine was already on. I couldn't use it for a middle of the night cry. Disappointed. On a positive note, the turtle is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: Way too loud
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 months old. This is great if she’s awake and needs something to keep her busy for a bit. BUT, if I’m trying to lull her to sleep, this is not the accessory to have. There are two volume settings...loud, and a little less loud. It’s loud enough where it just keeps her awake and interested. If it was quieter it would be perfect to help her fall into sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: samantha king

customer_reviews.title: Great Underwater scene
customer_reviews.text: Great item. The sounds are mellow and calming. 2 sound settings, multiple combinations of lights and sound depending on the time of day or night. Has a remote attachment. It also has a bracket to secure to a playpen or crib.
customer_reviews.author: GreatGiftNinja

customer_reviews.title: Stuck in demo mode
customer_reviews.text: Just opened for the first time, pulled the tag off to disable demo mode but it will only play for a few seconds at a time. I changed the batteries of the soother and remote, but the remote doesn't work and the soother appears to be stuck in demo mode.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Babies love it!
customer_reviews.text: My twins both love this, so I had to buy two. We don’t allow screen time, so this is the perfect toy to hold their attention. It’s really neat and mesmerizing. My only complain is your cannot adjust the brightness or volume.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Our 5 yr old is addicted to his musical crib toy
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 yr old has had one since birth. He uses it every night to go to sleep and if he wakes up during the night. He loves it and has to have it. On the downside, he is on his 3rd one. They have not lasted. Also it eats 4 C size batteries every couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: S.Kehl

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: We loved this soother until it started squeaking, now it's just annoying! Also, wish there was more than 2 volume settings. It can be pretty loud. When batteries are fresh it is very bright. Before the squeaking, my baby loved this and kept her happy in her crib.
customer_reviews.author: sand yo

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 sets of rechargable batteries
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since my daughter was 6 months old and she's now about to turn 3. Had to replace it once and my biggest recommendation is to buy two sets of rechargable batteries as this will go thru a set a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hernandez and Marilyn Vega

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 months and really likes looking at lights and colors and sounds so since we don't have a mobile for her crib, we got this cause we thought she would enjoy it more and its way cheaper. We put it on every night when putting her down for the night and she just loves it. Gets her to sleep every night.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good distraction!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We actually got it to put on the headrest in the car because our baby hates the carseat. It helps keep her distracted for a little bit in the beginning of the car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my baby
customer_reviews.text: He's about to be four months and can lift his head up so I figured I would get him some thing interesting to look at. He loves this thing I think the noise and the motions make him sleepy 😂
customer_reviews.author: stasia

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing
customer_reviews.text: My baby received this toy from the hospital while she was in PICU and she loved it! It gave her something to look at when she was sitting in a hospital bed for almost 2 months. She loves the music and the fishies moving. It soothes her. I ended up buying one for the house so she can have it when we get home.
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Paper Weight!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this product all seemed fine worked well for about 3 weeks. But then the light began flickering and eventually didnt come on. No movement ... just sound. I call the customer support line and am told I would be contacted in 5 days to work out replaceing the product. 5 days go by .... nothing not a word. Poor product ... Poor customer service. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Ehren woerner

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was a preemie she was in the hospital for a while they had one of these there and she absolutely loved it so I got on here and ordered her one and she still loves it it is wonderful and works great it’s worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: cathie

customer_reviews.title: Loud, louder and then batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Only control is loud and louder, although the volume adjusts automatically to a low and mellow tune as your baby may falls asleep, but if you want to restate while your baby has initially dosed off, you may end up waking them up. Uses up batteries crazy.
customer_reviews.author: JESSIE J

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My ONLY complaint is I wish there was a slightly lower volume setting. We found the lowest to still be a bit loud, so we solved that by stuff a blanket under the speaker. Everything else is great. My 3 month old loves it and it makes bedtime/naptime so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Awful, stay away!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful, they changed it and now it's muffled and no indication on when it is low on battery. The new model is awful, stay away this is my second one and still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Quade

customer_reviews.title: Best toy for my baby
customer_reviews.text: This is the first toy of my little peanut. I bought this when he was 2 months old and since then he likes to watch it. Of course, this is a soother but my baby never slept watching it but at least I am happy that whenever he awake, he keep starring it and I can do my chores.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for learning to like the crib ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old loves this aquarium! It definitely helps drown out the noise in the house and when she wakes up she can turn it on herself and play instead of immediately crying for someone to get her. I definitely notice a difference if I forget to turn it on when laying her down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Because of this product, my 6month old is able to just hang in his crib in the mornings if he wakes up too early. He stays up pressing buttons and playing with this soother for about an hour!! It gives me the extra time to snooze in the morning or get a head start for the day. Love love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessenia

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old son loves it and his 4 year old sister also really likes it. It's a little too bright but other than that the music is great and it's really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mines after 3 days it did this. I have uploaded a video turns off and on every 10 sec. for the price this should not be happening
customer_reviews.author: yusimy c.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but loud
customer_reviews.text: As much as my 8 month old son loves this unfortunately it is very loud and bright so all he wants to do it play with it by pressing the star fish button to turn it on and off repetitively and he will not go to sleep if it’s on. I also did not like the fact that the fish don’t move unless the music is on. I do like this product it is very nice, just too loud since the option for volume is medium or high so it dose not sooth my baby to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Padron

customer_reviews.title: Music function broken
customer_reviews.text: The music did not work on ours. My son still loves looking at the lights and movement so we have kept it. This is not related to the quality, but it is also weird to me that there are zero fish on it, but there is a tiger and a giraffe?
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler sleep trainer
customer_reviews.text: It’s more expensive than you think it should cost but it actually works in helping your toddler learn to put themself to sleep or self amuse in the morning. Our two year old loves having her own “tv” to unwind.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound machine
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Soothing, genuinely pretty to watch, calm music or “white noise.” Have has it for 2 years with my son and he absolutely loves it still, just bought it for my baby and the first time she saw it she couldn’t look away. She fell asleep within 10 minutes. Can’t ask for better, we all absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my daughter when she was a couple of months old and I now buy it for my friends who are having babies. It really helps baby calm down in the crib. We used it when transitioning the crib and my almost 2 year old still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting babies to sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this it puts him to sleep every time! The only thing I’d like to see change would be the volume when it mutes after a while before it turns off if you have to turn it back on I wish it would come back on at the muted level.
customer_reviews.author: BigSis10

customer_reviews.title: Latch it down
customer_reviews.text: It moves like it said it would and the lil grandson is glued to the screen , my daughter loves it also . She takes him by the windows where he can see outside and puts the baby Einstein on the floor in front of him and he enjoys it being only 6 weeks old .
customer_reviews.author: James Evans

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a joke. Love the idea but I just purchased this item 4 days ago and I tried connecting the remote so I can keep turning it on for my newborn and it doesn’t work. And the actual screen won’t stay on for longer than 6 seconds without pressing f the remote which doesn’t work. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!! It works!
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like we had tried everything for our 16 month old son to go to sleep and STAY ASLEEP! We tried creams, oils, lotions, sleep training method, books, and probably a magic potion or two!!! But nothing worked!! So on a whim, I bought this little gadget and so far its been a success! Now if he rarely wakes up, he'll cry for a little bit, push the button that plays his sweet melodic music, and he'll go back to sleep like magic!!! My biggest regret is that I didn't buy this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Life savor ! My baby loves this but it looks like the turtle might get stuck in the near future. Update: July 30... so the units light won’t turn on or the animals move only been using it for a month 🙄 now I have to buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: cute, but makes a clicking sound with the movement
customer_reviews.text: it's adorable, and I'm sure baby will love it, but I noticed it makes a clicking sound as the animals move. Hoping it doesn't get any louder soon, or I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for the current Baby Einstein aquarium my daughter cannot live without in her room because after 2.5 years, the little ocean creatures stopped moving. I've only had this item for a month and it already is making odd noises and is struggling to move the animals. It does not appear the same quality as the one I purchased from Target years back. It still works, but I'm worried it won't for much longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Einstein Sea Dreams Soother Musical Crib Toy and Sound Machine, Newborns Plus
product_meta.description: Style:Sea Dreams Soother + RemoteFill your little one with wonder and set sail for sweet dreams with this best-selling aquarium crib soother. More than just a lullaby machine, the Sea Dreams Soother comforts baby with classical melodies, soothe, and glow light effects – brought to life by an enchanting cast of Baby Einstein characters. Little eyelids grow heavy with the unique Drift Off feature, which gradually softens lights and sounds every 10 minutes. Parents can reactivate the soother remotely to avoid wake ups or disturbances. And because this sleep machine is made just for our littlest loves, babies can easily turn the soother on themselves if woken in the middle of the night. Even the busiest babies need a good night’s sleep, so they can explore the world around them well rested and refreshed.
feature_bullets: Fits most crib rails with approximate circumference of 10.5"
Adjusts to baby’s preferences with light & volume control
Remote control works up to 12’ away
Easy to wipe down and clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,961 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
